title: Foxit security advisory (AV25-623)
description: On September 25, 2025, Foxit published security advisories to address vulnerabilities in the following products:
products: Foxit PDF Editor for Mac  multiple versions
Foxit PDF Reader (Windows)  version 2025.2.0.33046 and prior
Foxit PDF Reader for Mac  version 2025.2.0.68868 and prior
solution: Review the references and apply the necessary updates.
